name: Zaynul Abedin Miah
bio: Cloud-native community leader, Co-Organizer Azure Tech Group Bangladesh and AWS Cloud Club Captain at BRAC University, passionate about empowering students through open source and cloud technologies. As Bangladesh's first AWS Cloud Club to reach 1,238+ members, Zaynul has hosted global events featuring AWS leadership, trained 15+ tech professionals in cloud certifications in his study group, and organized KCD Chattogram 2024 with 2,000+ participants. Active contributor on dev.to AWS and Microsoft tag moderation, AWS Builder Center technical blogs, and recognized in AWS PartyRock Hackathon. Driven by democratizing cloud-native education across South Asia, he bridges students with global ecosystems while promoting inclusive tech communities.
